api.services

Class MailService

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.services.MailService

  • @Service
public class MailService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service to facilitate interacting with external IMAP and SMTP servers. Handles creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving locally stored folders and messages to be sent back to the client.
    Author:
    mattgogerly

    • Constructor Detail

      • MailService

        public MailService(@Autowired
                   AccountAuthService accountAuthService,
                   @Autowired
                   AccountService accountService,
                   @Autowired
                   MessageRepository messageRepository,
                   @Autowired
                   FolderRepository folderRepository)
        Create a new MailService. Tries to load the classifier and data normaliser from the classpath. If either are missing then we just exit because there's no point continuing.
        Parameters:
        accountAuthService - AccountAuthService for getting auth info. Autowired by SpringBoot.
        accountService - AccountService for getting Accounts. Autowired by SpringBoot.
        messageRepository - MessageRepository is a CRUD interface for messages in the database. Autowired by SpringBoot.
        folderRepository - FolderRepository is a CRUD interface for folders in the database. Autowired by SpringBoot.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public javax.mail.Store connect(java.lang.String accountId)
        Try and connect to an IMAP/SMTP server. If we already have an active connection then we return that instead, since connecting is expensive and can result in being rate limited.
        Parameters:
        accountId - Id of the Account we're connecting to
        Returns:
        JavaMail Store object we can use to interact with the server

      • getLocal

        public LocalResponse getLocal(java.lang.String id)
        Gets folders and messages that we have previously stored in the database.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the Account
        Returns:
        LocalResponse object containing folders and messages

      • getOlderMessages

        public boolean getOlderMessages(java.lang.String accountId,
                                java.lang.Long limit)
        Get up to limit messages older than the oldest local message for each folder.
        Parameters:
        accountId - Id of the Account
        limit - Maximum number of messages to get
        Returns:
        True if successful or false otherwise

      • update

        public boolean update(java.lang.String accountId)
        Get updates from the server. Fetches new messages that have arrived since we last connected and checks that known messages haven't had flags changed (i.e. read or deleted).
        Parameters:
        accountId - Id of the Account
        Returns:
        True if successful or false otherwise

      • updateFolders

        private boolean updateFolders(java.lang.String accountId)
        Gets updates to folders since last check. Retrieves latest unread message count, deletes removed folders and adds new ones.
        Parameters:
        accountId - Id of the Account
        Returns:
        True if successful or false otherwise

      • updateMessages

        private boolean updateMessages(java.lang.String accountId,
                               java.lang.Long limit)
        Gets updates to messages since last check. Gets new messages, old messages up to a specified limit, and checks flags for existing messages.
        Parameters:
        accountId - Id of the Account
        limit - Limit if getting older messages
        Returns:
        True if successful or false otherwise

      • processNewMessages

        private boolean processNewMessages(Account account,
                                   DetailedFolder df,
                                   javax.mail.Folder f,
                                   java.lang.Long min,
                                   java.lang.Long max)
        Processes messages with UIDs between min and max.
        Parameters:
        account - Account we're dealing with
        df - Local folder the messages belong to
        f - Remote folder we're retrieving from
        min - Minimum UID (aka oldest)
        max - Maximum UID (aka newest)
        Returns:
        True if successful or false otherwise

      • processNewMessage

        private DetailedMessage processNewMessage(Account account,
                                          javax.mail.Message m,
                                          DetailedFolder df,
                                          javax.mail.UIDFolder uf)
                                   throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                          java.io.IOException
        Processes a new message from the server.
        Parameters:
        account - Account the message belongs to
        m - Message we're processing
        df - Local folder the message belongs to
        uf - Remove folder the message belongs to
        Returns:
        DetailedMessage if successful or null
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - if there's data missing for the Message
        java.io.IOException - if there's a file or connection issue

      • processExistingMessages

        private boolean processExistingMessages(Account account,
                                        DetailedFolder df,
                                        javax.mail.Folder f)
        Processes known messages that are already stored locally.
        Parameters:
        account - Account the messages belong to
        df - Local folder the messages belong to
        f - Remote folder the messages belong to
        Returns:
        True if successful or false otherwise

        Parameters:

        info - Message data to be converted to a new Message object
